{{Description|A new challenge with new goals! Take part in the Paimon Quiz Event from HoYoLAB each day and answer questions correctly to win Mora!}}
'''A Thousand Questions With Paimon''' is a [[Web Event]] in [[Version 1.4]].

==How to Access Event==
Go to [https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/ys/event/answer-question/index.html?activity_no=d2a9f2f0b4f242aa&utm_source=website HoYoLAB]. Alternatively, through in-game's Event Notice or Mail.

==Event Duration==
2021-04-06 13:00:00 – 2021-04-08 23:59:59 (UTC+8)

==Event Details==
Travelers at Adventure Rank 10 or above can take part in this event<br>
There will be 10 multiple choice questions each day for this event. A correct answer will grant rewards, while an incorrect answer will result in none. The challenge can be restarted to retry the questions that were answered incorrectly at first to obtain the remaining rewards.

==Event Rewards==
{{Item|Mora|25|x=5,000}} will be obtained for every correct answer<br>
Claim rewards for up to 10 questions each day

==Reward Delivery==
Via in-game mail (there may be some delay in the delivery of rewards)<br>
The mail will be valid for 7 days, so be sure to collect your rewards in time~
